targets.rawSql:
SELECT name from server_user
WHERE server_user.id = $userId

SELECT MAX(server_userbill.updated_at)
	FROM server_userbill
	WHERE server_userbill.user_id = $userId
SELECT MAX(server_userbill.amount) FROM server_userbill WHERE server_userbill.user_id = $userId

SELECT SUM(server_measurement.consumption) as month, date_trunc('month', server_measurement.measured_at) as time
	FROM server_measurement INNER JOIN server_equipment ON server_measurement.equipment_id = server_equipment.id
	WHERE server_measurement.measured_at >= date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) and server_equipment.user_id = $userId
	GROUP by time

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 1

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 2

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 3

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 4

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 5

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 6

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 7

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 8

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 9

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 10

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 11

select ub.consumption 
from server_userbill ub 
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where ub.user_id = $userId and b.month = 12

select ub.consumption
from server_userbill ub
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where b.month = extract(month from CURRENT_DATE) and ub.user_id = $userId
select count(*) from server_user where id <> 1;

SELECT SUM(server_measurement.consumption)
	FROM server_measurement INNER JOIN server_equipment ON server_measurement.equipment_id = server_equipment.id
	WHERE server_measurement.measured_at >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
	AND server_measurement.measured_at <= (date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) + interval '1 month')
	AND server_equipment.user_id = 1

select SUM(ub.consumption)/COUNT(ub)
from server_userbill ub
left join server_bill b on ub.bill_id = b.id
where b.month = extract(month from CURRENT_DATE)

list.definition: select id from server_user where name = 'Gustavo Ziyu Wang'
list.name: userId
